Package com.example.demo.repository

Interface OtherTestResultRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OtherTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OtherTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<OtherTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<OtherTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OtherTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<OtherTestResult>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OtherTestResult,Integer>
public interface OtherTestResultRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OtherTestResult,Integer>

    • getAverageResult

    • findAllByOtherTestAndStudentName

      @Query("SELECT otr FROM OtherTestResult otr WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest AND otr.student.name LIKE %:studentName%") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<OtherTestResult> findAllByOtherTestAndStudentName(@Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest, @Param("studentName") String studentName, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findAllByOtherTestId

      @Query("SELECT otr FROM OtherTestResult otr WHERE otr.otherTest.otherTestId = :otherTestId") List<OtherTestResult> findAllByOtherTestId(@Param("otherTestId") Integer otherTestId)

    • findAllByStudentId

      @Query("SELECT otr FROM OtherTestResult otr\nJOIN otr.student s\nWHERE s.id = :studentId\n") List<OtherTestResult> findAllByStudentId(@Param("studentId") Integer studentId)

    • findAllByOtherTestWithSort

      @Query(" SELECT otr FROM OtherTestResult otr WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest\n ORDER BY\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'japanese\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.japanese END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'japanese\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.japanese END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'math\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.math END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'math\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.math END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'english\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.english END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'english\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.english END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'science\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.science END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'science\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.science END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'social\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.social END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'social\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.social END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'music\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.music END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'music\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.music END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'pe\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.pe END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'pe\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.pe END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'art\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.art END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'art\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.art END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'tech\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.tech END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'tech\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.tech END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total5\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.total5 END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total5\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.total5 END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total9\' AND :direction = 1 THEN otr.total9 END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total9\' AND :direction = 0 THEN otr.total9 END DESC,\n otr.otherTestResultId ASC\n") List<OtherTestResult> findAllByOtherTestWithSort(@Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest, @Param("sort") String sort, @Param("direction") Integer direction)

    • findAllResultByOtherTest

      @Query("SELECT otr FROM OtherTestResult otr WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest\n") List<OtherTestResult> findAllResultByOtherTest(@Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest)

    • findAllByOtherTestWithKlassSortAndDate

      @Query(" SELECT otr FROM OtherTestResult otr\n JOIN otr.student student\n WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN :direction = 1\n THEN (\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n ELSE -(\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n END\n") List<OtherTestResult> findAllByOtherTestWithKlassSortAndDate(@Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date, @Param("direction") Integer direction)

    • findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(otr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(otr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(otr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(otr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(otr.social), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE(k.name, \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM OtherTestResult otr\n JOIN otr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest\n GROUP BY k.name\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreForKlass> findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubject(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(otr.total5), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total9\' then ROUND(avg(otr.total9), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM OtherTestResult otr\n JOIN otr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON ks.klass = k\n AND k.sortOrder = (\n SELECT MAX(k2.sortOrder)\n FROM KlassStudent ks2\n JOIN ks2.klass k2\n WHERE ks2.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks2.createdAt AND ks2.changedAt\n )\n WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest\n GROUP BY COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\')\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreForKlass> findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubject(@Param("totalSubject") String totalSubject, @Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(otr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(otr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(otr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(otr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(otr.social), 1)\n END,\n \'\u5168\u3066\',\n \'\'\n )\n FROM OtherTestResult otr\n JOIN otr.student student\n INNER JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest\n") AverageScoreForKlass findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubject(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForEveryClassForEachTotalSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(otr.total5), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total9\' then ROUND(avg(otr.total9), 1)\n END,\n \'\u5168\u3066\',\n \'\'\n )\n FROM OtherTestResult otr\n JOIN otr.student student\n INNER JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n WHERE otr.otherTest = :otherTest\n") AverageScoreForKlass findAverageForEveryClassForEachTotalSubject(@Param("totalSubject") String totalSubject, @Param("otherTest") OtherTest otherTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)
